com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model

Class SingleValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor<T extends java.util.Date>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model.FieldDescriptor<T>
      • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model.SingleValueFieldDescriptor<T>
        • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model.SingleValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The field content type, must extend java.util.Date.
    Enclosing class:
    SingleValueFieldDescriptor<T>

    public static class SingleValueFieldDescriptor.UtilDateFieldDescriptor<T extends java.util.Date>
extends SingleValueFieldDescriptor<T>
    Class to instantiate Document fields containing one single date value.
